definitions: the quality or condition of being at a fairly low temperature
shortDefinitions: quality or condition of being at fairly low temperature

definitions: the quality of being soothing or refreshing because of its low temperature

examples.text: the refreshing coolness of the water

shortDefinitions: quality of being soothing or refreshing because of low temperature

definitions: (in reference to color) the quality of containing pale blue, green, or gray tones

examples.text: her art has an icy coolness

shortDefinitions: the quality of containing pale blue, green, or grey tones

definitions: the quality of lacking friendliness or enthusiasm

examples.text: the coolness towards the revolutionary cults

shortDefinitions: quality of lacking friendliness or enthusiasm

definitions: freedom from excitement, anxiety, or excessive emotion

examples.text: his greatest strength is his coolness under pressure

shortDefinitions: freedom from excitement, anxiety, or excessive emotion

definitions: the quality of being fashionably attractive or impressive

examples.text: the coolness of this phone was worth the extra money

shortDefinitions: quality of being fashionably attractive or impressive
